trans-unit.source: An activity that receives a message as part of a request/reply message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: To działanie, które otrzyma komunikat w ramach wymiany komunikatów żądania/odpowiedzi.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity is created and added to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> działania jest tworzony i dodawany do <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is then added to the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> to receive the reply from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> działania jest dodawane do <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> odebrać odpowiedzi od <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> działania.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> class.
Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość nagłówka action wiadomości.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content received by the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> activity
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia zawartość odebranych przez <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> działania

trans-unit.source: The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.
trans-unit.target: Zawartość może być jedną z następujących typów: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> when receiving a message <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> podczas odbierania komunikatu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> lub typ kontraktu komunikatu.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> when receiving data contract types.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> podczas odbierania danych kontraktu typów.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of correlation initializers.
For more information about correlation see [Correlation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat korelacji zobacz [korelacji](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> activity paired with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia odwołanie do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> działania łączyć się z tym <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> działania.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activities are used together to model a request/response message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> działania są używane razem do modelu wymiany komunikatów żądań i odpowiedzi.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is paired with.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość określa, która <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> działania <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> wraz z działania.
